text: after i completed my engineering degree
the first step in my career was as a
research engineer
during these years in the research world
i started working on a european research
project related to the cloud that was my
first experience with the cloud
computing and it was very exciting
at some point in my professional life i
wanted to discover the corporate world
but whilst also remaining in the cloud
domain
today i'm a senior solution architect at
iws in france as a solution architect i
work with customers to understand their
business needs
and to provide guidance and best
practices on how to leverage
technologies to solve their challenges
with traditional or innovative solutions
i represent iws in face-to-face meetings
and own the overall technical
relationship between iws and the
customer up to sea level
as a solution architect the way i work
with a customer depends completely on
the maturity of their cloud journey
so adaptability is the key skill that we
practice not only daily but often during
the same meeting
the most exciting part of my job is
helping customers to reach their
business outcomes and seeing firsthand
that by using our technology we are
helping them to go one step further in
reaching their goal and sometimes
defining new ones and new business
models
